name: Swing Bolt
description:
Hover around the arena and grab batteries with your swinging golden tail to stay charged!

This is my entry into the Ludum Dare 39 game jam competition. It was made in 48 hours, based off the them "Running out of Power". Find the entry page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/swing-bolt

Play the updated, post-jam version here: (with leaderboards!)

http://ajweeks.com/SwingBolt

Follow me on Twitter: @liqwidice
